description: A quick and delicious grilled paneer sandwich filled with spiced cottage cheese, veggies, and cheese â€” perfect for breakfast or evening snacks.
instructions: In a bowl, mix grated paneer, chopped onion, tomato, chili, salt, and red chili flakes.
Spread green chutney or mayonnaise on each bread slice.
Add the paneer mixture on one slice and cover it with another slice.
Apply butter on the outer sides of the sandwich.
Grill or toast the sandwich until golden brown and crisp.
Cut diagonally and serve hot with tomato ketchup or chutney.
